titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in St. Maries church at Gates-head in the county-Palatine of Durham at the funeral of George Johnson, Gent., deceased, May 29, Anno Dom 1683 / by Richard Werge ... ; whereunto is added, Anelegy by a friend.
titleStmt.author: Werge, Richard, 1624 or 5-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Clark, for Joseph Hall ... and Robert Clavel ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
